title: Creators Newsletter: All The Highlights From Week 15 | creators.co

thread.title_full: Creators Newsletter: All The Highlights From Week 15 | creators.co
thread.title: Creators Newsletter: All The Highlights From Week 15 | creators.co

author: Creators Team
text:
Written By Justin Worthington @SynapticGaming 
Dark Souls 3: The Ringed City has got a lot to offer #gaming fans, that goes without saying. From its innovative gameplay to its perceptive lore and countless challenges, #TheRingedCity truly succeeded in breathing new life in this ever so popular video game. 
Written By Mak Hashi @MakHashi 
#Drake is single handedly bringing 2014's #TopBoy back to our television screens. The Canadian actor-turned-rapper, who shared his love for the show back in 2014, has bought the rights to the show and is now involved as can be when it comes to reviving this British gem. 
Written By Harold Dyer @Arksville 
What started out as a small animated #horror web-series quickly became something much bigger. It's creator, Lewis Roscoe, describes his passion project, The Arksville Homicides, as The Exorcist meets Sleepy Hollow meets Supernatural. Yeah, you're not alone, we'd 100 percent watch that too. JOIN OUR FACEBOOK GROUPS Music Moguls 
It doesn't matter whether you're a musician yourself or simple a fan of the #art , 'Music Moguls' is a place for fans of #music in any shape or form to discuss and share what they love. Room 237 
'Room 237' is a place for Creators and influencers passionate about all things #horror , creepy and macabre. Come chat with other fans and stay up to date with with what's going on in the horror community then join our FB group! Don't be shy, come and chat with us. Forever, and ever! Good Eats 
'Good Eats' is a group dedicated to all of you who love food almost too much. Whether it's a favorite #recipe , mouth-watering pictures or reviews; we want to hear ALL about it! 
Ps: Be sure to check out the Good Eats Instagram page. The Animation Nation 
Whether you're a #Disney / #Pixar fanatic or a proud #otaku , 'The Animation Nation' is a home for passionate #anime and #animation fans. If you love the animation art-form and want to chat with like-minded fans, come and join the fun. The Active You 
If you're into #health , #fitness and #nutrition then 'The Active You' might just be your next go-to. If you're a runner, post your latest run log, if you're a nutrition nut, post your latest meal. Share your #passion and motivate others while you're at it. Want To Take Your Writing Skills To The Next Level? 
Check out our Creators Academy course. It's free, self-paced and is your fast track to becoming a Verified Creator . Latest from our Creators
